help: <html> element must have a lang attribute
failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute
why_any: has-lang: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

help: Document should have one main landmark
failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark
why_all: page-has-main: Document does not have a main landmark

help: All page content should be contained by landmarks
html:
Example Domain

This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

More information...
failureSummary:

  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body
why_any: aria-hidden-body: No aria-hidden attribute is present on document body
